snippet: Italian and Greek helicopter crews worked into the night to airlift passengers off a burning ferry adrift in the Adriatic Sea, battling darkness and bad weather that hampered rescue efforts by other ships throughout Sunday....

headline.print_headline: Hundreds Still Awaiting Airlift on Stricken Italian Ferry
headline.main: Hundreds Still Awaiting Airlift on Stricken Italian Ferry

lead_paragraph: Italian and Greek helicopter crews worked into the night to airlift passengers off a burning ferry adrift in the Adriatic Sea, battling darkness and bad weather that hampered rescue efforts by other ships throughout Sunday.
